hero.description: I am a fresh graduate of the bachelor of library and science information program from <0>Maliki Islamic University</0> in Malang with a <1>GPA of 3.83</1>. I specialized in and developed skills in <2>digital marketing</2>, particularly in <3>SEO</3>, <4>copywriting</4>, <5>content writing</5>, and <6>social media marketing</6>.
hero.descriptionAbout: I am a graduate of the Bachelor of Library and Information Science program from Maulana Malik Ibrahim State Islamic University in Malang with a GPA of 3.83. During my studies, I specialized in and developed skills in digital marketing, particularly in SEO, copywriting, and social media marketing.

joy.title: Chief Marketing Officer — Job on Yours (JOY)
joy.key_responsibilities: Strengthening digital dominance and JOY brand growth through strategic marketing leadership and technology-based work system optimization.
joy.key_achievement: Achieved 59.20% engagement rate, 529% follower growth, and Best Division and Best Head of Division awards.
desc: This achievement began with my promotion from Head of Branding to Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) leading four creative divisions simultaneously in managing over 44 content briefs and captions with a consistent 4-times-a-week publication schedule. I succeeded in improving team operational efficiency through the development of 3 automated task management applications based on Google App Script (SOSBOARD|MORPEST|ALL-MARK), which proved capable of maintaining high productivity despite handling a large workload.

This marketing strategy successfully recorded an engagement rate of 59.20% with a reach of 2,185 accounts, as well as continuing the follower growth trend I had previously achieved of 529% in three months. Thanks to this data-driven leadership, my division was named Best Division and I was personally selected as Best Head of Division for three consecutive months as a form of recognition for the quality of management and branding I built.

paradicfest.title: Head of Grand Marketing — Paradicfest Vol.2
paradicfest.key_responsibilities: Succeeding in organizing large-scale music concerts through integrated marketing strategies and adaptive leadership in facing organizational crises.
paradicfest.key_achievement: Sold 8,000 tickets (exceeding target by 33.3%) with 1.2 billion Rupiah revenue and addressed 36 staff across 5 divisions.
desc: This achievement is proven by my success in leading 36 staff across 5 different divisions after restructuring the team to overcome internal crises and human resource shortages. I designed an aggressive marketing strategy that included a 4-times-a-week roadshow program at strategic points as well as the production of 54 Instagram contents and 45 TikTok contents within 3 months.

Through collaboration with 28 media partners and 7 influencers, we successfully sold 8,000 tickets, which means exceeding the initial target by 33.3% and recording gross revenue reaching 1.2 billion Rupiah. This strategy not only secured the financial side but also increased the number of Instagram followers to 15.5K and ensured the entire series of events ran successfully with high professional standards.

cetta.title: Program Facilitator — Cetta Online Class
cetta.key_responsibilities: Boosting new student growth and community quality through measurable student ambassador programs and result-oriented team management.
cetta.key_achievement: Successfully acquired 5 new students independently and guided 62 Student Ambassadors through 8+ mentoring programs.
desc: This achievement began with my role as a Student Brand Ambassador who successfully achieved the acquisition target of 5 new students independently, which then led to me being trusted to level up to become a Program Facilitator for Batch 3. In this leadership position, I was responsible for guiding 62 Student Ambassadors in achieving their acquisition targets through the execution of 8+ mentoring programs and 3 periodic evaluations to maintain team loyalty and work quality.

Through strategic mentoring and strong communication as a representative of the Cetta team, I successfully ensured all members remained disciplined and aligned with the organization's greater goals in expanding Cetta Online Class market reach to various campus environments.

buangdisini.title: Content Writer Intern — Buangdisini.id
buangdisini.key_responsibilities: Increasing brand visibility and circular economy literacy through multi-platform content strategies and impactful digital marketing asset development.
buangdisini.key_achievement: Increased Instagram followers by 1,200+ (3.5K to 4.7K+) and produced 10+ SEO articles and media releases for strategic collaborations.
desc: This achievement is evidenced by my success in managing and distributing over 140 content briefs and captions for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and TikTok platforms, directly contributing to an increase in Instagram followers by 1,200+ (from 3.5K to 4.7K+). Additionally, I designed 10+ SEO-friendly articles for the official site and produced 5+ newsletter marketing materials to support the company's B2B growth initiatives.

My role also included drafting press releases for prestigious agendas such as the collaboration with Oppo Creativepreneur Corner 2023 which were successfully published by local media, while maintaining high productivity by running three professional commitments simultaneously at Candidate College, Cetta, and Buangdisini.

candidate.title: Co-Head Content Writer — Candidate College
candidate.key_responsibilities: Expanding platform reach and influence through multi-platform content strategies and organized, impactful team leadership.
candidate.key_achievement: Drove 23% Instagram follower growth (25K to 30.8K), LinkedIn (1K to 1.7K), and won Best Division and Staff of the Month awards.
desc: This success began with my promotion from staff to Co-Head of Content Writer Division, fully responsible for managing routine content schedules, covering coordination of 7 Instagram Stories, 2 Instagram feeds, and 2 Twitter and LinkedIn posts each week. I productively managed the creation of over 200 content briefs, video scripts, and captions for various platforms ranging from Instagram, Twitter, Spotify, TikTok, YouTube, to LinkedIn using a systematic content planner matrix system.

This team's hard work yielded tangible results in the form of Instagram follower growth from 25K to 30.8K (up 23%) as well as LinkedIn followers increasing from 1K to 1.7K, leading our division to be named Best Division in April 2023. Personally, my dedication was recognized through the Staff of the Month award (November 2022) and completion of tenure with a "Very Good" predicate (final score up to 89.5), proving the consistency of my performance in terms of technical ability, communication, and discipline.

ambassador.title: Student Ambassador of Faculty Science & Technology — Duta FST
ambassador.key_responsibilities: Enhancing faculty image and visibility through official representation roles and strategic communication at national to international levels.
ambassador.key_achievement: Most Favorite Ambassador FST 2023 and trusted as MC for prestigious agendas like ICGT 2024 & 2025.
desc: This achievement began with my success in winning the title of Most Favorite Ambassador FST 2023 which led me to serve as the official face of the faculty for the 2023-2025 period. I was entrusted with protocol and MC duties in prestigious agendas such as the International Conferences of Green Technology (ICGT) 2024 & 2025, Graduation (Yudisium), to Professor Inauguration involving international guests and university officials. Additionally, I led outreach promotion programs to various schools in Probolinggo and Madiun and initiated social activities such as breaking fast with orphans, which effectively strengthened institutional collaborative relationships and built a broad professional network.

dema.title: Interest & Passion Department. — DEMA FST
dema.key_responsibilities: Professionally managing talent development systems and faculty event management through structured coordination.
dema.key_achievement: Consistently executed major agenda series and led the 2024 FST Ambassador Selection with 36 participants.
desc: I successfully executed a series of major faculty agendas consistently from 2021 to 2025, with the main achievement of leading the 2024 FST Ambassador Selection which attracted 36 participants from all majors and produced 6 pairs of selected ambassadors. Through direct coordination with the leadership ranks from the Dean level to lecturers, I ensured other major operational events like NSEC and Saintek Event ran smoothly with high quality standards. This consistent contribution in event management and reputation as a mainstay MC is proof of my professionalism which then paved the way to be officially selected as part of the FST Ambassador for the 2023-2025 period.

bic.title: Head of Education Department. — BIC (Bank Indonesia Corner)
bic.key_responsibilities: Rebuilding BIC's existence as a credible and influential institution within the campus environment.
bic.key_achievement: Reactivated the organization through 3 'KANTIN' study programs and strategic collaboration with Bank Indonesia and Jawa Pos.
desc: I successfully reactivated the organization that had been vacuum for 2 years through the initiation of 3 'KANTIN' study programs and strategic collaborations with Bank Indonesia and Jawa Pos. As proof of success, BIC is now trusted to have a permanent office on the 2nd floor of the central library and was given a special introduction session in the Library Introduction Week agenda. In addition, the organization's existence was further strengthened through official coverage on the UIN Malang library website and the Bank Indonesia Malang branch blog, which effectively restored public trust and created a new standard for future management sustainability.

hmps.title: Vice Head of Academic Department. — HMPS PSI UIN Malang
hmps.key_responsibilities: Improving student academic quality through engaging educational programs and building solid, recognized team leadership.
hmps.key_achievement: 100% completion rate of main work programs and selected as a speaker for Train of Organization (TOO) 2025.
desc: This success is evidenced by a 100% completion rate of main work programs, including organizing workshops with external experts and managing 'Sudut Pustaka' content routinely every 2 weeks through infographics, microblogs, and quizzes. I also successfully improved team dynamics and administrative obstacles by diving directly into the field and reinforcing internal committee rules, ensuring all operational agendas ran smoothly according to plan. As recognition for this performance, I was selected as a speaker in the Train of Organization (TOO) 2025 event to provide training on leadership and organizational strategy for new administrators.

kol.title: KOL Specialist — Asian Kung-Fu Generation 30th Anniversary
kol.key_responsibilities: Maximizing event visibility and ticket sales figures through measurable, extensive, and efficient influencer ecosystem management.
kol.key_achievement: Managing 100% of the collaboration cycle with 20+ influencers to drive ticket sales conversion.
desc: i am currently entrusted to manage 100% of the collaboration cycle with 20+ influencers (nano, micro, to macro levels) targeted to grow over the 4-month campaign period to drive AKG 30th Anniversary concert ticket sales conversion. My responsibilities cover the entire operational stage from pitching, fee negotiation, MOU processing and payment, to brief creation and strict preview and posting schedule arrangement on TikTok and Instagram. Through management of 20+ creator partners and intensive coordination with buzzer vendors to amplify content, I successfully built a neat work system to ensure every promotional material gets maximum reach and effectively converts potential audience into real ticket buyers for the event at Hall Basket Senayan.

aeml.title: Event Operator — AEML (Report Launching & FGD Projects)
aeml.key_responsibilities: Guaranteeing the success of technical event execution to strengthen organizational credibility in the eyes of government stakeholders and international institutions.
aeml.key_achievement: Achieved 100% technical smoothness rate in 2 main national agendas (presidential regulation report launch and FGD forum).
desc: This success is validated by a 100% technical smoothness rate in 2 main national agendas, namely the launch of the presidential regulation report and the FGD forum regarding Indonesia's electric vehicle potential. I held full control over end-to-end audiovisual operations, including videotron synchronization for bumper screening, ministry leadership technical materials, to microphone audio system distribution for all VIP participants. Through highly meticulous technical management, I ensured this series of events involving the Directorate General of ILMATE Ministry of Industry and Rocky Mountain Institute (RMI) ran without a single technical hitch, thereby maintaining a high-level professional atmosphere and strengthening stakeholder trust in event organization quality.

visualizer.title: Data Visualizer — Training of Trainers (TOT) Rumah Energi
visualizer.key_responsibilities: Transform technical data complexity into strategic information assets that support decision-making and policy follow-up.
visualizer.key_achievement: Managing, analyzing, and visualizing more than 25 data series into one unified report system.
desc: This success is proven through my role in managing, analyzing, and visualizing more than 25 data series collected hybridly, from offline written notes to online input via Google Forms and Spreadsheets. I led the integration of all raw data into one unified report system which was then transformed into precise and systematic visual narratives. The final result of this work was acknowledged as a highly satisfactory and functional visual report, where Rumah Energi and partners felt greatly helped in extracting important insights to compile accurate policy follow-up reports for government agencies and international organizations.

tot.title: Event Operator — Training of Trainers (TOT) Rumah Energi
tot.key_responsibilities: Guaranteeing the success of technical event execution to strengthen organizational credibility in the eyes of stakeholders.
tot.key_achievement: Achieved 100% technical smoothness rate in the Training of Trainer (ToT) agenda.
desc: This success is validated by a 100% technical smoothness rate in the Training of Trainer (ToT) agenda. I held full control over end-to-end audiovisual operations, covering videotron synchronization, technical materials, to microphone audio system distribution. Through highly meticulous technical management, I ensured this series of events organized by Rumah Energi ran without a single technical hitch, thereby maintaining a high-level professional atmosphere and strengthening stakeholder trust in event organization quality.

email.title: Email Marketer — Kreatologi & Communiverse.id
email.key_responsibilities: Built professional B2B email marketing infrastructure and distributed service offers.
email.key_achievement: Established a standardized marketing channel that enhanced professional digital identity and client trust.
desc: In September 2025, I served as an Email Marketer for Kreatologi and Communiverse.id, where my main focus was building professional communication infrastructure for B2B outreach needs. Kreatologi, as an event organizer service company, required a credible communication channel to offer their services to corporate clients. My tasks included comprehensive email marketing system configuration, including the creation of professional domain-based business email addresses. I was responsible for drafting and distributing event management service offer materials, both offline and online, specifically targeted at various companies in the FMCG sector.

The result of this initiative was the creation of a more standardized marketing channel and an increased level of professional digital identity for the company in the eyes of prospective clients. By using well-configured business emails, I successfully strengthened Kreatologi's image when making strategic approaches to targeted FMCG company subjects. This experience provided valuable lessons regarding the importance of technical aspects in supporting marketing credibility. I realized that in the professional world, a neatly organized digital identity is the main entry point to building trust and opening collaboration opportunities with large-scale business partners.

radio.title: WordPress Builder — Radio Suara Kota Probolinggo
radio.key_responsibilities: Redesigned radio website with live streaming integration and accessibility features.
radio.key_achievement: Completed secure and inclusive website on time, meeting all internal requirements for public information services.
desc: In July 2024, I was entrusted to redesign the Radio Suara Kota Probolinggo website, a unit under the Probolinggo City Communication and Informatics Department (KOMINFO), due to the old platform being irrelevant to current digital standards. The main challenge in this project was integrating complex technical features, such as a live radio streaming system and an interface friendly to users with disabilities. During three weeks of work using WordPress, I focused on building an inclusive site architecture while implementing strict cybersecurity protocols, including conducting brute-force testing to ensure system resilience against external attacks.

As a result, the website was successfully completed on time with very satisfactory security performance and was officially accepted by the institution's internal team. The success of implementing accessibility features and complex audio integration served as proof of my technical capability in producing reliable digital solutions for public institutions. This experience deepened my expertise in WordPress system management and provided personal professional satisfaction in being able to contribute to the modernization of public information services through secure and accessible technology.

kreatologi.title: WordPress Builder — Kreatologi
kreatologi.key_responsibilities: Restored compromised website from brute force attack and hardened security systems.
kreatologi.key_achievement: Fully recovered and secured the website within one week to client satisfaction.
desc: In February 2024, I handled the website recovery project for Kreatologi, which had just experienced configuration damage due to a brute force attack. My main task was to perform a total restoration of the disordered digital footprint and rebuild the site's security system to be more resilient in the future. I began the process by conducting a deep audit to understand the main cause of the system vulnerability, researching original theme references used, and cleaning up all remaining traces left by hackers. After cleaning the messy configuration, I reorganized the site structure and made design adjustments to several parts according to special requests from the owner to improve its functionality.

Through intensive work, I successfully completed the entire recovery process in just one week with results that were very satisfactory to the company owner. The success of this project became tangible validation of the technical skills I learned as an autodidact, especially in handling cybersecurity crisis situations and WordPress database management. This experience gave me a sense of pride and a valuable lesson that deep understanding of technical structures and strong research skills are key to solving complex problems. The success of this restoration is now proof of my competence in providing web solutions that are not only aesthetic but also have high technical resilience.

shaperior.title: WordPress Builder — Shaperior
shaperior.key_responsibilities: Built e-commerce platform with automated payment gateway integration (Midtrans).
shaperior.key_achievement: Delivered comprehensive 14-page website in one month, marking successful entry into commercial client projects.
desc: I was entrusted to build an e-commerce platform for Shaperior, a gym accessories brand, with a primary focus on integrating an automated payment system via WooCommerce and Midtrans payment gateway. To ensure security and ease of transaction for lay users, I conducted deep research into buyer profiles and product characteristics to design an intuitive interface free of technical hurdles. I worked on this project intensively through a learning-by-doing approach, simultaneously taking online website management classes from habiskerja.com to ensure every technical feature was implemented with high functional standards.

The result was a comprehensive website consisting of 14 pages successfully completed within one month and fully handed over to the owner in smooth operational condition. This project was a very memorable achievement as it was my first experience handling a client outside my personal circle (stranger), which simultaneously validated my competence in managing commercial-scale projects. Through this experience, I not only delivered a ready-to-use digital product but also deepened my technical expertise in Midtrans payment system integration and website management, which are now important assets in my career as a web developer.

ypud.title: WordPress Builder — Yayasan Pemberdayaan Ummat Darussalam (YPUD) Kebumen
ypud.key_responsibilities: Developed professional website from analysis to high-fidelity execution for an educational foundation.
ypud.key_achievement: Successfully launched a modern, functional website in two weeks, exceeding client expectations.
desc: During my fourth semester of college, I was entrusted by the Chairman of the Yayasan Pemberdayaan Ummat Darussalam (YPUD) Kebumen to build a professional website as the digital representation of the institution managing levels from RA, MI, to the Football School (SSB-DSA). I started this project by conducting a deep analysis of the foundation's needs to define the features and assets most targeted for the educational institution's profile. I carried out the work process in a structured manner, starting from the preparation of the skeleton plan and low-fidelity design to high-fidelity execution using WordPress with Elementor Pro support to ensure a modern and functional look.

In two weeks, I successfully completed and launched the website using reliable hosting infrastructure to guarantee optimal performance and accessibility for the public. The success of this project became an important milestone in my professional journey, proving that I was able to meet client expectations tangibly despite still being an active student. This experience providing valuable lessons on project management from upstream to downstream and becoming a strong motivation for me to commercialize the technical skills I possess professionally from an early age.
